CustomField.description: Field to hold the Group/Region user value for the Household PRM
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Account.ucinn_ascendv2__PRM__r.ND_Group_Region__c), "1","East", "2","Midwest", "3","West", "4","South", "P","Principal Gift", "G","Gift Planning", "R","Programs", "C","Corporate Relations", "U","University Relations Exec.", "A","Annual Giving", "T","Athletics", "I","Global Advancement", "D","Academic Advancement", "X","None", "F","Foundation Relations", "E","Corporate/Foundation Relations", "J","Central", "K","East Coast", "L","Illinois", "N","Northwest", "M","NY Metro", "S","Southern", "H","Southwest", "","", "Unknown Region" )
CustomField.label: Household PRM Region
